data.title: State Retail and Food Service Codes and Regulations by State
authors: Center for Food Safety and Applied Nutrition
data.meta_description: FDA Food Code adoptions by States. Adoption of the Food Code represents a successful federal/state/local partnership in improving food safety.
data.text:
